sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_customerservice_case</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_customerservice_case">parentVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="parent" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Prevent parent child circular dependency</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[var rt = new global.RecursionTester('sn_customerservice_case', 'parent'); if (rt.isRecursive(current)) { current.setAbortAction(true); gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('The selected case is already a parent of this record (Recursive case loop).')); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-05-24 19:12:39</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>092c68198716130023108467a7cb0b9d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Prevent parent child circular dependency</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Customer Service" source="sn_customerservice">51d811fad7223100b7490ee60e61034f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Customer Service">51d811fad7223100b7490ee60e61034f</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_092c68198716130023108467a7cb0b9d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-05-25 18:54:23</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=092c68198716130023108467a7cb0b9d"/> </record_update>
